h2_title: Black Loong Boss Fight and Guide
content: Sometimes he’ll end the two sweeping electrical swings by finally bringing both weapons together in front of him, and create a shockwave with an expanding electrical ring as they connect that you’ll need to dodge or jump over — or even rise up on your Pillar Stance to retaliate with a heavy attack as it passes under you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Black_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Black Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Black Loong Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Sometimes he’ll end the two sweeping electrical swings by finally bringing both weapons together in front of him, and create a shockwave with an expanding electrical ring as they connect that you’ll need to dodge or jump over — or even rise up on your Pillar Stance to retaliate with a heavy attack as it passes under you.
